title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 35.4 - Restrictions upon issuance and use of permits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 35.4 - Restrictions upon issuance and use of permits

State Regulations
(a) A permit shall authorize only the sale
and service of those alcoholic beverages which the licensee is authorized to
sell under its on-premises license. (b) In exercising its discretion in
determining whether to issue the permit, the authority shall consider the
following: (1)
licensee's disciplinary
history, including any pending proceedings; and
(2)
whether, given the nature of the
function, occasion or event, the licensee has adequate security plans and
facilities. (c) At all
times while the permit is in effect, the permit certificate shall be displayed
in a conspicuous place in the room where the particular function, occasion or
event is held. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
35.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
